featured.text: The increasing population in Saudi Arabia has resulted in shortages of fresh water.
But fresh water can be in short supply in many arid regions of the world such as Saudi Arabia, where there are limited water resources.

definition.zh_def: 沙烏地阿拉伯的，或與沙烏地阿拉伯有關的。
definition.en_def: Relating to Saudi Arabia or its people.
definition.example: The Saudi government announced new economic reforms.
